abilities.name: BURST ACORN
abilities.casting: Arced projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

abilities.name: TAIL BOUNCE
abilities.description: Rocket upwards with a bounce of her tail

abilities.name: MAMMAL BOND
abilities.description: Reload Burst Acorns and can use an ability without cooldown once in a short duration

abilities.name: SQUIRREL BLOCKADE
abilities.description: Launch an acorn to unleash Squirrel Guards, Imprisoning the first hit enemy
abilities.casting: Charged projectile with an arced trajectory
abilities.projectile_speed: 20 - 60 m/s (Maximum speed is achieved after 0.7s of charging)

ultimate.name: UNBEATABLE SQUIRREL TSUNAMI
ultimate.description: Summon a horde of squirrels to charge forward, dealing damage while bouncing against structures
ultimate.effect: The squirrels will rush towards the nearest enemy after bouncing instead of bouncing randomly.

teamups.name: ESU Alumnus
teamups.details:
Casting: Arced projectile that generates a spell field upon impact
Cast Time: 1.1s
Projectile Speed: 50 m/s
Spell Field Range: 4m spherical radius
Spell Field Damage: 80
Imprison Duration: 1s

gameplay.strategy_overview: Mastering self-defense is crucial, as opponents will try to eliminate you. Practice using Squirrel Blockade to effectively counter high-mobility characters like Spider-Man or Psylock; if you have a Spider-Man on your team, you can use Webbed Acorn. Utilize Squirrel Girl's ultimate frequently, even in 1v1 situations, to gain a tactical advantage, essentially giving your team an extra character on the field for 12 seconds. Exploit environmental awareness by bouncing shots off walls to hit enemies hiding behind cover. When facing flying characters like Storm or Iron Man, use your trap to stun them, bringing them within your attack range. Improve your aim and consistency by practicing in the practice range, focusing on stun-locking flying bots. Provide support to teammates, especially tanks, by firing at their attackers, and coordinate with damage dealers like Iron Fist to secure eliminations. Use Squirrel Blockade or Webbed Acorn to stun enemy tanks that dive into your backline, protecting your team. Prioritize eliminating Loki clones and Anks, as Squirrel Girl can dispatch them quickly, disrupting enemy strategies.
weaknesses: Has no defensive or self-sustain tools.
Vulnerable to dives and when Tail Bounce is on cooldown.
Burst Acorn has the lowest damage distance falloff in the game, meaning her damage output vastly decreases the farther she is from her opponents.
It also cannot deal critical damage.
Targets rooted by Squirrel Blockade and Webbed Acorn can still attack and use non-mobility abilities.
Unbeatable Squirrel Tsunami can be easily avoided, as it only hits ground targets; enemies flying or on high ground won't be affected by it.
In addition, the squirrels have a healthbar and can be taken down.

achievements.name: Stark Fan Club Founder
achievements.description: As Squirrel Girl, partner with Iron Man to land 1 KO.

achievements.name: "Ahh, those tiny claws!"
achievements.description: As Squirrel Girl, land 3 KOs with a single use of Unbeatable Squirrel Tsunami.

lore_details.ingame_bio_text: Possessing only the powers of a common squirrel, somehow Doreen Green manages to defeat seemingly invincible enemies in the most unexpected ways. Any foe who counts her out is bound to fall at the hands of the Unbeatable Squirrel Girl!

hero_stories.title: Bushwhack!
hero_stories.content:
"Well, that should take care of them!" the Unbeatable Squirrel Girl said as she stood over a group of freshly-defeated attackers. "Another horde of vampires down for the count. Good work, everybody!"As Squirrel Girl praised her army of rodent companions for their efforts, the tiny creatures began to chitter with delight. They would do anything for their human friend, Doreen Green — even risk their lives against the seemingly endless throng of nocturnal nightmares that had emerged after an ancient curse trapped New York City in a state of perpetual night.
"You've definitely earned a trip to Mr. Hickory's fresh roasted nut cart on the corner of 55th and — "
Before Squirrel Girl could finish that thought, her BFFF — Best Furry Friend Forever — Tippy-Toe scurried past her fellow squirrels and climbed right onto Doreen's shoulder. As Tippy began to chirp into Squirrel Girls' ear, Doreen's ever-present smile dropped a bit.
"Wait... that can't be right..." Squirrel Girl said. "A giant squirrel... fell out of the sky...? Here in Central Park...? Are you sure, Tippy?"

changes: Squirrel Girl was released as the 29th character to be introduced to Marvel Rivals as a Duelist hero.
Added 2 new costumes: Arctic Lemmus and Urban Hunter.
Added the "Ahh, those tiny claws!" achievement.
Added to the ESU Alumnus Team-Up Ability with Spider-Man.
Enemies defeated by Unbeatable Squirrel Tsunami that get KO’d two seconds after being released now count towards the achievement!
Rectified instances where Squirrel Girl's ultimate ability could get stuck on specific terrain.
Addition of a new effect to the Unbeatable Squirrel Tsunami: the squirrels will rush towards the nearest enemy after bouncing instead of bouncing randomly.
Reduce the squirrel tsunami health from 600 to 300.
Resolved a sound issue where Squirrel Girl's hit sound effect was occasionally too sharp. Her acorns now land with a perfect pop!

Corrected an issued with Squirrel Girl's default emote where facial expressions where missing when used in a match. Now, when she unleashes her quirky charisma, every nutty moment is captured with the full force of her animated personality!

lore_details.official_description: Squirrel Girl is a Duelist hero in Marvel Rivals, and is the 29th hero introduced to the game's roster. She has team-up abilities that work in conjunction with Spider-Man.

lore_powers_skills: Superhuman strength, speed, reflexes, and agility
